data.title: Passion New Eve by Angela Carter, First Edition
data.meta_description: The Passion of New Eve by Carter, Angela and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Mass Market Paperback. Condition: Very Good. First Paperback Edition. First UK paperback edition. Originally published in hard covers in the UK by Gollancz in 1977. The spine is a little browned with fading to the title lettering. Covers a little browned but otherwise unmarked. Pages a little browned but otherwise clean and unmarked. First printing.

8vo. pp 182. From the working library of novelist Angela Carter (1940 - 1992) with her posthumous bookplate. This small, attractive bookplate reads 'From the Library of Angela Carter' and was designed by Sebastian Carter of the Rampant Lions Press and was authorised by the executors of her estate. Fine. First Edition. Wraps.

Original Cloth. Condition: Good. First Edition. This edition looks like it was intended for a library but never got there. The jacket is laminated to the boards and the jacket flaps are glued to the front and rear pastedowns. There is a little fading to the spine. The page edges are browned with a little marking to the top edges. The pages are slightly browned but otherwise unmarked. First printing.

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First Edition; First Printing. First American edition. Close to fine in like just jacket. (Slight crease at upper edge of front jacket flap. Tiny trace of foxing at top edge. ) A choice copy.
